battleship2000.programlogic.rules

Class BasicRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • battleship2000.programlogic.rules.Rules
      • battleship2000.programlogic.rules.BasicRules

  • public class BasicRules
extends Rules
    A set of pre-made basic rules for a standard five-ship two-player battleship game played on a ten by ten game table.
    Author:
    Petri Kallio

    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicRules

        public BasicRules(boolean againstTheComputer)
        An instantiation of the class.

        Creates a set of rules used to create the BattleShipGame. If the boolean value given as parameter is true, the game shall be played against a Computer. If false, a Human player shall be the opponent

        Note! The program logic doesn't actually yet support a game between two human players, so only games against a computer player should be started until the multi-player gaming feature has been added.

        Parameters:
        againstTheComputer - if true, played against a computer player
